name: STWebpageController
desc: The controller you use to report web usage and block restricted webpages.

items.name: var suppressUsageRecording: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the webpage controller is not recording web usage.

items.name: var urlIsBlocked: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether a parent or guardian has blocked the URL.

items.name: var urlIsPictureInPicture: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the webpage is currently displaying a floating picture in picture window.

items.name: var urlIsPlayingVideo: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether there are one or more videos currently playing in the webpage.
